comment.body: Your link is invalid. When i open it i see: "User not found or muted"
Sign and push /data/content.json and then content.json in your hub root folder.
@Kaffie: What's different are between KaffieID and zv.anonymous from ZeroVoat (who looks the same as anonymous from 0chan)?
@Kaffie: Thanks. Technically, how to ban someone in content.json using KaffieID/ZVID etc.? He can theoretically change his username so what to do?
